mapper.insert: insert into Staff_tbl(StaffId, StaffPwd, StaffName, StaffEmail, StaFirPhoneNum, StaMidPhoneNum, StaLastPhoneNum, StaffRank) values(#{staffId}, #{staffPwd}, #{staffName},#{staffEmail},#{staFirPhoneNum},#{staMidPhoneNum},#{staLastPhoneNum},#{staffRank})
mapper.update: update Staff_tbl set StaffName = #{StaffName}, StaffEmail = #{staffEmail}, StaFirPhoneNum = #{staFirPhoneNum}, StaMidPhoneNum = #{staMidPhoneNum}, StaLastPhoneNum = #{staLastPhoneNum} where StaffId = #{staffId}
